application_type_full: Prior Approval: Change of use - offices to dwellinghouses
description: Prior Approval for the change of use from Use Class B1(a) (Offices) to Use Class C3 (Residential) to provide 46 self-contained units (6 x studio flats, 38 x 1-bed flats, and 2 x 2-bed flats) with provision of car parking, cycle and refuse storage.
